level.heading: Residential property tax relief - No homestead when multiple homesteads claimed.
level.text: If an individual, shareholder or member claims more than one homestead in the same tax year, and has not timely notified the Mayor of all changes in eligibility, the Mayor shall disallow the deduction for all homesteads claimed by the individual, shareholder, or member.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-105, in the section name line, validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 2(e) of Homestead and Senior Citizen Real Property Tax Temporary Act of 2001 (D.C. Law 14-92, March 19, 2002, law notification 49 DCR 2997).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 2(e) of Homestead and Senior Citizen Real Property Tax Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-190, November 29, 2001, 48 DCR 11219).

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Section 3 of D.C. Law 14-147 provided that section 2 shall apply as of October 1, 2001, except insofar as the retroactive application results in an increase of tax to the real property or owner thereof.
